Who am I?

I am an INTJ believer of nihilism with a sheer focus on efficiency, commitment, and achievement.
I love Frontier Technologies, especially AI & Robotics.
I have strong aptitude for Mathematics and Logical Thinking.
I will create Artificial Consciousness, as my life purpose.

What is Mr.Q's Hub?

My knowledge base for my lifelong project.
I collect whatever I find useful for the development of "REAL AI" here.
After I make enough money to pay my debts, I will utilize this hub and devote the rest of my life to my mission.
